ac: 20, touch 15, flat-footed 16 (+3 armor, +4 Dex, +2 shield, +1 size)
other_gear: studded leather, heavy wooden shield, mwk dogslicer, shortbow with 20 mwk arrows, tindertwigs (7), giant gecko mount, 2 gp

sections.body: During Combat The goblin outrider uses its bow or alchemist's fire, then switches to Power Attack to increase its damage and Ride-By Attack to keep away from melee opponents.
sections.name: Tactics

name: Goblin Outrider
skills: Acrobatics +3, Handle Animal +3, Perception +6, Ride +10, Stealth +14, Swim +3
combat_gear: potion of bull's strength, potions of cure light wounds (2), alchemist's fire (4), tanglefoot bags (2)
